sentences.english: Siamese fighting fish are available in a wide range of colors.
sentences.chinese: 暹罗斗鱼的体色各式各样，选择面极广。

sentences.english: Siamese dancers strike a pose in a temple courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 暹罗舞者在一座寺庙的庭院前摆出姿势以供拍摄。

sentences.english: In ancient Siam, which now is called Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在古暹罗，即现在的泰国。

sentences.english: It relates to the Buddhist belief in Siam.
sentences.chinese: 这与暹罗人信仰佛教有紧密的联系。

sentences.english: He is considered one of the greatest kings of Siam.
sentences.chinese: 他被认为是最伟大的暹罗国王之一。

sentences.english: Siamese cats are rather like dogs in some ways.
sentences.chinese: 暹罗猫在某些方面长得有点儿像狗。

sentences.english: Not say also raises three big dog two Siam cat.
sentences.chinese: 说不得还养了三只大狗两只暹罗猫猫。

sentences.english: Manx and Siamese have been mentioned as being among the longest-lived pedigreed cats.
sentences.chinese: 有报导说马恩岛无尾猫和暹罗猫是能活得最长的猫。

sentences.english: Siamese cat having a bluish cream body and dark gray points.
sentences.chinese: 有灰色斑点的蓝白色暹罗猫。

sentences.english: Little Siam is the first hotel in Holland with a real Thai ambiance.
sentences.chinese: 小暹罗是第一个酒店在荷兰与一个真正的泰国风情。

sentences.english: Siam was a small and weak country and situated in the buffer area of British-Franco expansion in Southeast Asian Mainland.
sentences.chinese: 暹罗位于英国和法国在中南半岛上扩张的缓冲地带。

sentences.english: Lung peng lei also saw on TV tower in Siam and development (ak) party to speak.
sentences.chinese: 蓬勒也在电视上看到塔隆在暹罗发展党发言。

sentences.english: An away-from-it-all hillside resort on the mystical Gulf of Siam.
sentences.chinese: 安外之资讯科技上的所有神秘的暹罗海湾山坡胜地。

sentences.english: A baby Siamese crocodile hatches from an egg at the Lao zoo outside Vientiane, Laos.
sentences.chinese: 老挝万象外的老挝动物园，一只婴儿暹罗鳄破壳而出。

sentences.english: Telon very happy because the Siamese development campaign now ranked first.
sentences.chinese: 塔隆很高兴因为暹罗发展党现在拉票排在第一。

sentences.english: The woman was holding a large Siamese cat and speaking to him in French.
sentences.chinese: 女人抱着一只暹罗猫，还用法语和它讲着话。

definition: variant of 暹羅|暹罗[Xian1 luo2]
Satsuma, the name of a former feudal domain in Japan, and of a former province, a battleship, a district, a peninsula etc
Ryūkyū/refers to the Ryūkyū Islands 琉球群島|琉球群岛[Liu2 qiu2 Qun2 dao3] stretching from Japan to Taiwan/Liuchiu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Khmer kingdom of Kampuchea or Cambodia/Chinese term for Cambodia from 7th to 15th century
Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
Ming Dynasty name for modern day Malacca/see also 馬六甲|马六甲[Ma3 liu4 jia3]
Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)
old term for Sulawesi or Celebes 苏拉威西
old Chinese name for Bengal, now written 孟加拉[Meng4 jia1 la1]
